alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 12:21AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 100 AM MST... At 1220 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Falcon Field Airport, or near East Mesa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, East Mesa, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, Downtown Mesa, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Superstition Springs Mall, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Goldfield Ranch, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area, Gold Camp, and Tortilla Flat. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 181 and 195. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 174 and 201. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 13 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
